#summary Cafe Townsend using Flex 4

== Installation notes ==

 * Use [http://opensource.adobe.com/wiki/display/flexsdk/Download+Flex+4 latest Flex SDK]. The example is tested using [http://opensource.adobe.com/wiki/display/flexsdk/download?build=4.1.0.14696&pkgtype=1 Flex 4.1.0.14696]

 * Add "-use-network=false" as a compiler attribute to avoid security errors loading xml data, such as _'cannot access local resource assets/data/Employees.xml. Only local-with-filesystem and trusted local SWF files may access local resources.'_ 

Have fun!
